title: Help!!!how can I switch my account from TW to NA?
body: I was playing TW server for years, and I spent a lot of money on buying skins and champions. I'm now living in North America and I cant play my TW server anymore. How can I switch my account?:(

replies.body:
Hey Nathan,

Unfortunately, we cannot transfer accounts from TW to NA or vice versa. If you have any questions, I recommend you contact [Garena Support](http://lol.garena.com/support).

> [{quoted}](name=Digital Ram,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OFjzGi34,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-27T02:15:16.421+0000)
>
> Hey Nathan,
> 
> Unfortunately, we cannot transfer accounts from TW to NA or vice versa. If you have any questions, I recommend you contact [Garena Support](http://lol.garena.com/support).

Or you know you could look into his account on TW look at everythings he's got make him a brand new account on NA. That has those same things and delete the one on TW but you know riot would never do those kinda things :)

If Riot manually cloned an account on a new server, many more than just one person would ask for the same thing. Doing it that way is not efficient or as easy as you make it seem. Either it's a situation like China and there's a long list of reasons Riot isn't allowed a normal transfer option, or there is some other reason for not simply having a TW server transfer.

So if I have a problem with transfers from server to server, that deserves more attention than other technical issues? I don't mean to be rude, I just don't like being ignored y'know. Would be nice if there was somebody out there who actually cares about players who can't access the game.
